name: Icewind Suite
desc:
Artificed Dancers developed by the Fontaine Research Institute.

Bossuet originally intended for Artificed Dancers to be works of art that transcended the era of mechanical reproduction. But after Bossuet was forced to resign, the project was taken over by Maillardet, who had his own unique understanding of what he wanted to achieve. As a result, while their features were perfected during the course of its development, the Artificed Dancers gradually strayed from Bossuet's original vision.

customize.text: Next up are fantastical performances to be delivered by clockwork meka Coppelia and Coppelius, brought to you by Maillardet of the Fontaine Research Institute. Before you begin the challenge, you must <color=#ffe14b>speak with Maillardet</color> and select the play you are challenging. The eventual resources claimed from the <color=#ffe14b>Ley Line Blossom</color> after completing the challenge will also differ based on your selection.

Dirge of Coppelia: The protagonist is Coppelia, a lady of the clockwork meka. At the climax of the performance, Coppelia will halt at the center of the dance floor and expose her artificed clockwork component charged with <color=#ffe14b>ousia</color> , thereby drastically increasing the efficiency of her exertions and summoning countless whirlwinds of dirge.

Nemesis of Coppelius: The protagonist is Coppelius, a noble of the clockwork meka. At the climax of the performance, Coppelius will halt at the center of the dance floor and expose his artificed clockwork component charged with <color=#ffe14b>pneuma</color> , thereby drastically increasing the efficiency of his exertions, granting him a Ward, and generating three retributive Frosthearts.

<color=#ffd780>Funerary Storm</color>
Use a Pneuma attack to weaken the whirlwind Coppelia creates during the performance's climax.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Icebound Oath</color>
Use an Ousia attack to remove the shield that Coppelius deploys during the performance's climax.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Shackle Me, That I Might Willingly Be Destroyed</color>
During the climax of "Icewind Suite: Dirge of Coppelia," use Coppelius's attack to make all the Dirge's whirlwinds undergo Elemental Conversion.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>The Power of Science is Staggering!</color>
Complete one form of the "Icewind Suite" challenge in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text: "Ride the Waves to a Rendezvous in Fontaine"

<color=#ffd780>August 29, 2023</color>
Icewind Suite Concept Art
Only available from August 28, 2023 - September 10, 2023
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/21225762</color>

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Artificed Spare Clockwork Component — Coppelia
dropMaterial.desc:
An artificed spare clockwork component belonging to Coppelia. It powers this artificed dancer.
According to its creator's design, the story of the artificed dancer with delicate joints ends at a merry moment. Coppelia will send whoever attempts to disturb that moment to a chapter of misfortune with her superb combat skills.

dropMaterial.name: Artificed Spare Clockwork Component — Coppelius
dropMaterial.desc:
An artificed spare clockwork component belonging to Coppelius. It powers this artificed dancer.

The artificed dancer whirls to a platinum tune, performing an unending waltz of icewind. Coppelius's dance will not stop. He will continue whirling till the bell tolls.

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."
